title: 1Panel-dev/1Panel
summary: 🔥 1Panel offers an intuitive web interface for Linux server, making it easy to manage OpenClaw agents, LLMs, websites, databases, containers, files, and scheduled tasks.

title: Moritransaltes/rpgmaker-translator
summary: Translate RPG Maker MV/MZ games from Japanese to English using a local LLM (Ollama). No cloud API needed — runs entirely on your machine.

title: nhdandz/ResearchRover
summary: A personalized research intelligence platform that helps researchers discover, organize, and interact with academic papers & repositories. Features AI-powered chat (RAG), semantic search, document management, and automated trend analysis from 11+ sources.

title: A2G-Dev-Space/Local-CLI
summary: AI Coding Assistant CLI for offline enterprise environments - Local LLM platform with Plan & Execute architecture, Supervised Mode, and auto-update system

title: LearningCircuit/local-deep-research
summary: Local Deep Research achieves ~95% on SimpleQA benchmark (tested with GPT-4.1-mini). Supports local and cloud LLMs (Ollama, Google, Anthropic, ...). Searches 10+ sources - arXiv, PubMed, web, and your private documents. Everything Local & Encrypted.

title: PlanExeOrg/PlanExe
summary: Create a plan from a description in minutes

title: ai-action/cy-ai
summary: 🧪 Cypress AI command that generates E2E tests with LLM (Large Language Model).

title: steffenpharai/Jarvis
summary: Fully offline Iron Man J.A.R.V.I.S. on Jetson Orin Nano (8GB) — voice + vision + 3D holograms + health monitoring. No cloud. No API keys.

title: soenneker/soenneker.semantickernel.pool.ollama
summary: Provides Ollama-specific registration extensions for KernelPoolManager, enabling integration with local LLMs via Semantic Kernel.

title: Ckrest/comfyui-ollama-nodes
summary: Local LLM integration for ComfyUI via Ollama with full parameter control.

title: Mintplex-Labs/anything-llm
summary: The all-in-one Desktop & Docker AI application with built-in RAG, AI agents, No-code agent builder, MCP compatibility,  and more.

title: James-Crockett/Enterprise-RAG-Chatbot
summary: A Permission-aware RAG KB chatbot where docs are embedded in vector database. Retrieval is filtered by user access level and sent to a Ollama LLM to generate grounded answers.

title: jimtin/zetherion-ai
summary: Secure personal AI assistant with encrypted memory, multi-provider LLM routing, and privacy-first design. Inspired by OpenClaw.

title: infiniflow/ragflow
summary: RAGFlow is a leading open-source Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) engine that fuses cutting-edge RAG with Agent capabilities to create a superior context layer for LLMs

title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Kimi-K2.5, GLM-4.7, DeepSeek, gpt-oss, Qwen, Gemma and other models.

title: diegorezm/llm-notebook
summary: Ask AI about your documents, even with no internet access

title: Nano-Collective/nanocoder
summary: A beautiful local-first coding agent running in your terminal - built by the community for the community ⚒

title: Jeffser/Alpaca
summary: 🦙 Local and online AI hub

title: nodetool-ai/nodetool
summary: Visual Builder for AI Workflows and Agents

title: bluet/arguslm
summary: The hundred-eyed watcher for your LLM providers. Monitor uptime, TTFT, TPS, and latency across OpenAI, Anthropic, Azure, Bedrock, Ollama, LM Studio, and 100+ providers through a single dashboard. Benchmark, compare, and get alerts — all self-hosted.
